Texts.Eng: Superior Utility Plants

Texts.Eng: Thornitox Weaponry

Texts.Eng: Ultimate Beekeeping

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了如何饲养农场动物，还设计了几个专门用来诱捕野生昆虫的柜子。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned how to raise farm animals and also designed a few cabinets designed to lure and capture wild bugs.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了狩猎采集技能，比如陷阱、捕鱼和制造专门的这些武器旨在最大限度地利用你杀死的东西中可用的材料。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned hunter-gatherer skills like trapping, fishing and creating specialized weapons designed to maximize usable material from the things you kill.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了一些更复杂的耕作方法，你现在可以制造一些有用的耕作用品。^cyan;生长托盘^reset;就是其中最重要的一个，因为它可以在肥料的帮助下自动生长放置的种子，并增加手工耕作所不能达到的产量。在你的^orange;加工台^reset;处制作一个。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned some more complex methods of farming and can now built several helpful farming objects. The ^cyan;Growing Tray^reset; is the most important of these, as it will automatically grow seeds placed inside with the help of fertilizers that increase yields far beyond what is possible through manual labor. Craft it at your ^orange;Machining Table^reset;.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了创造一些简单的生存辅助工具 - 名为便携式光源的东西来帮助探索。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to create some simple survival aids - namely portable light sources to help with exploration.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会在蜂房里养蜜蜂，为你提供有用的资源。你可以从在^orange;加工台^reset;制造^cyan;蜂场工作台^white;^reset;上开始。

饲养蜜蜂很复杂。如果你不知道怎么养蜂，你可以从科学前哨的蜜蜂庇护所那里购买一份指南，前哨站在你离开起始星球之后就可以到达。

作为简单入门，你需要一只显微镜识别过的蜂后、一只匹配的显微镜识别过的工蜂、一个或多个框巢，以及在蜂房附近种植的一些花卉，以便开始生产。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to raise bees in an apiary to provide you with useful resources. Make an ^cyan;Apiary Crafting Station^reset; at your ^orange;Machining Table^reset; to get started.

Raising bees is pretty complex. If you're not sure how, buy a guide from the Bee Refuge in the Science Outpost, accessible once you leave your starter planet.

As a simple starter tip, you need a microscope-identified queen, a matching microscope-identified drone, one or more frames, and some flowers planted nearby for production to start.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

植物分析台的效率对您的研究来说有些慢了，因此您制作了它更复杂的电子版本。这对您未来的研究工作至关重要，在您的^orange;自动组装器^reset;上制作它
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

The sprouting table is a little slow for your liking, so you made a more complex electronic version, which will be critical to your future research efforts. Craft it at your ^orange;Auto-Assembler^reset;.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你可以制造更大的蜂房和更有用的框巢来提高蜜蜂的产量。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make bigger bee apiaries and more useful Frames to supplement their production.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你可以制造更亮更棒的灯和一些先进的生存工具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make brighter, better lights and a few advanced survival tools.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你可以制造更好的动物饲料和一些自动化设备来收集动物的产品，省去你的麻烦。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make even better animal feed and some automated devices to collect products from them, saving you the trouble.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

您已经学会了如何培育一些阿威坎作物了，最初是由来自卡达文星球的星际游牧民族种植的。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to cultivate some strange Avikan crops, farmed by a race of starfaring nomads originally from the planet Kadavan.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

您已经掌握了大地守护团所教给您的所有植物，现在你可以创造更多的人工植物。包括极为重要的^yellow;棉绒^reset;，这在制造装甲，家具，时髦的衣服和养蜂设备方面将非常有用。您已经准备好进入新的分支去制造各种各样药用植物而不是为了提供饱食度，它们不会变质而且提供各种有用的增益，比如环境抗性、治疗、增加属性甚至用于制造武器！
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've mastered all the plants the Protectorate Academy taught you about, allowing you to artificially create many more plants, including the all-important ^yellow;Cotton^reset;, which will be very useful in making armor, furniture, fashionable clothing and beekeeping equipment. You're ready to start branching into making various medicinal plants that don't provide satiation, but don't spoil and provide useful buffs like environmental resistance, healing, increased stats, or even weapons!

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3.5级^reset;

棘刺不是一种好的食物，但它是一种厚实而坚韧的藤蔓，可以制造出完美的杀伤武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3.5^reset;

Thornitox isn't good for eating, but it's a thick, tough vine that can create weapons perfect for killing.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3.5级^reset;

。您已经学会如何栽培泡荚种子，它们具有生物发光性，可用于制造武器和盔甲，以及用于制作灯饰来装点您的基地
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3.5^reset;

You've learned to grow the gross-but-useful Blister Pods. They're bioluminescent, and can be used in making weapons and armor, as well as lights for decorating your base.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

钓鱼既是一种有用的生存技能，也是一种放松的爱好。你现在可以制作一根基本的钓鱼杆，并使用它来捕捉水体中的鱼。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Fishing is both a useful survival skill and a relaxing hobby. You can now create a basic fishing rod and use it to catch fish in bodies of water.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

宇宙是一个危险的地方，充满了您生理上无法适应的多种环境，您的研究使您可以使用许多植物来让宇宙变得更加宽容。这就包括有助于穿越困难地形、让您产生天然抗毒性、并在危险气候下增强您生理机能的植物
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

The universe is a dangerous place, filled with many environments your physiology isn't equipped to handle. Your research has given you access to a number of plants that make the universe a little more forgiving, including plants that assist in traversing difficult terrain, produce natural antitoxins, and shore up your physiology from dangerous climates.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

。宇宙是一个艰苦的地方，想要获得丰富的资源需要付出巨大的努力。您的研究利用生命的奇迹来减轻这种负担，创造能提供丝绸、遗传资源、治疗能力、采矿工具的植物来节省您宝贵的资源和精力，以备不时之需。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

The universe is a gruelling place, requiring great effort to extract the meanest of resources from it. Your research uses the miracle of life to lift this burden, by creating plants which provide silk, genetic resources, healing, and mining aids, saving your valuable resources and effort for where they're needed elsewhere.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

。宇宙是一个充满敌意的地方，无数的怪物和敌人渴求着您的鲜血，却很少会有盟友站在你这一边。您的研究将为您提供一个公平的竞争环境，强化您的生命并增加防御来让让您免受伤害。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

The universe is a hostile place, with countless monsters and enemies out for your blood and few allies to stand alongside. Your research levels the playing field, fortifying your health and increasing your defenses to shield you from harm.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

保持你的农场动物健康和快乐的顶级装备。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Top of the line gear for keeping your farm animals healthy and happy.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你可以制作顶级的灯具和生存工具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You can craft top of the line lights and survival tools.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你可以制作一个电力水培生长托盘，它在供电时运转得更快，而且不像热灯托盘那样使用额外的水。你可以在你的^orange;电子设备制造机^reset;找到它。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You can make an hydroponics-powered Growing Tray that operates even faster when powered, and doesn't use extra water like the Heatlamp Tray does. You can find it at your ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

。您利用您的基因工程知识将一棵树的树叶嫁接到另一棵树的树干上，创造出奇异的结合。这拥有无穷的可能性，实验的成果将是巨大的。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've used your knowledge of genetic engineering to splice trees together into strange combined forms with the trunk of one tree and the leaves of another. The possibilities are immense, and experimentation will yield great results.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经在猎人采集战略上有了很大的进步，并且可以创造出比以前更好使用的猎人工具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've vastly improved in hunter-gathering tactics and can create far more capable hunting tools than before.

Texts.Chs:
^orange4.5级^reset;

。实验室中的实验为您提供了三种新的植物，可以用作制作武器和炸药，或者放在物质萃取器中获得有机的铁、钨和钛。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4.5^reset;

Experiments in your lab have provided you with three new plants, which can be used as weapons and explosives, or put into an extraction lab to produce organically-grown iron, tungsten and titanium.

Texts.Chs:
^orange4.5级^reset;

仅仅吃掉自己种植的植物并不使您感到满意，您创造了可以作为武器投掷的新菌株，去和你的敌人分享它们吧。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4.5^reset;

Unsatisfied with simply eating the plants you grow, you've created new strains which can be thrown as weapons, to share them with your foes as well.

Texts.Chs:
^orange4.5级^reset;

您创造了一系列植物来强化您的自然能源储备，包括能量花，它充盈着能量以至于可以作为您飞船的FTL引擎燃料。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4.5^reset;

You've created a family of plants that fortify your natural energy reserves, including Energiflower, a plant so packed with energy that it can even power your ship's FTL drive.

Texts.Chs:
^orange4.5级^reset;

您已经学会了如何研制一些专门的植物来增强您在水中的移动力，并制作出了劳瑞冻，一种奇怪的果冻状蘑菇可让您在水下甚至完全真空的环境里呼吸一段时间（它对您的身体是无害的）。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4.5^reset;

You've learned how to develop some specialized plants that enhance your mobility in water, and created Vorit, a strange jelly-like mushroom which allows you to breathe normally underwater or even in a total vacuum for a while, then harmlessly passes through your system..

Texts.Chs:
^orange4级^reset;

进一步的研究使您创造出可以完全让您免疫毒素和酸的植物，并使您免受许多外星物质的危险辐射伤害。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Further research has given you plants that can protect you entirely from poisons and acid, as well as shield you from the dangerous radiation of many alien materials.

Texts.Chs:
^orange4级^reset;

通过精密的实验，您创造出了产出极其有用资源的植物，包括有机硅、抗辐射丝绸和可以提炼成飞船或机甲燃料的强化藻豆荚。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Through careful experimentation, you've created plants that produce incredibly useful resources, including organic silicon, radiation-resistant silk and enhanced algae which can be processed into fuel for your ship and mech.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你可以制作质量更好的钓具，让你更轻松地捕鱼。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can craft better quality fishing tackle, enabling you to catch fish with greater ease.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

可以制造更强大的框巢，极大地提高蜜蜂的效率。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can make even more powerful Frames that drastically improve your bees' efficiency.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你已经进一步改进了基因提取器的设计。新的高级^cyan;基因提取器^reset;工作效率非常快。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've improved even further on your Xenolab design. Your new ^cyan;Advanced Xenolab^reset; works incredibly fast.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你已经掌握了狩猎-采集战术，可以制造顶级的狩猎装备。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've mastered hunter-gatherer tactics and can make top-shelf hunting gear.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

您的研究已经取得了硕果，使您有能力种植更优秀品种的强化植物以及一种奇特的触手状植物，它可以反射伤害给那些试图攻击你的人。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Your studies have borne fruit, granting you the ability to grow stronger varieties of fortifying plants, as well as a curious tentacled plant that reflects damage back at those who would seek to harm you.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5.5级^reset;

艾玛花炽热的花瓣中充满了有用的暗影气体，正等待被提取。现在你可以培育自己的艾玛花，来轻松的获取该资源。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5.5^reset;

The searing hot petals of the Aenema plant are packed with useful Shadow Gas just waiting to be extracted. Now that you can cultivate your own Aenema, you will have easy access to that resource.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5.5级^reset;

您创造了拥有彭泽浆果了，这是一种非常有用的植物，既可以用来保护自己免受放射性灼伤，又可以在物质萃取器中提取罕见且极为有用的外星化合物。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5.5^reset;

You've created Garp berries, an incredibly useful plant which can be used both eaten to protect yourself from radioactive burns, and processed in your extraction lab to create the rare and extremely useful Alien Compound.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

作为遗传学工程方面的专家，您已经可以开始创造出在黑暗中照亮您前路的植物，它的光芒将远超金色蘑菇所能到达的级别。您还在做有机的性能增强因子的实验，包括使您免受高空坠落伤害和免疫重力雨。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

An adept at genetic engineering, you've begun to create plants which greatly light your way in the darkness, beyond the level that Gold Shroom was capable of. You're also experimenting with organic performance enhancers, including those which protect your body from lethal falls and gravitic rain.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

通过大量的实验，你正在慢慢获得不容小觑的力量，您的植物将您强化到非人的等级，削弱您的敌人生命并增加您的伤害。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Through much experimentation, you're gradually becoming a force to be reckoned with. Your plants can strengthen you to inhuman levels, sap your enemies' life and increase the damage you deal out.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

以你的捕鱼知识，你可以制作一根近乎完美的钓竿。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

With your knowledge of fishing, you can create a nearly perfect fishing rod.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你可以制作高级的框巢，大大改善你的蜂巢。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You can make advanced Frames that drastically improve your hives.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

您已经尤为擅长运用生物工程学来探索外星世界了，并创造了数种植物抵御更多来自深奥的威胁。包括气态巨行星的巨大压力、怪异的鬼魂，甚至是在基因实验室投入数小时后饱受折磨的心里健康。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You're becoming especially adept at exploring alien worlds through the use of bioengineering, and have created several new plants protecting from more esoteric threats, including the crushing pressure of gas giants, eldritch ghosts, and even the poor mental health hours of slaving away over a gene lab results in.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

您已经创造了众多甚至更强大的植物，它们是具有毁灭性的投掷物。像是地狱火藤蔓这样的植物甚至可以被用来开发强大的武器，需要在战斗科研树上进一步解锁。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You've created a number of even stronger plants, which are devastating when thrown, and in the case of hellfire plants can even be used to create some powerful weapons, with some further research in the weaponry tree.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

一位不可阻挡的主宰者，您现在狩猎那些曾经掠过您的人。用您的有机武器在杀戮他们的同时也枯竭了他们的元气，整个宇宙都尽在您的掌握，您的遗传武器无与伦比。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

An unstoppable juggernaut, you now hunt those who used to prey upon you, draining their vitality even as you slay them with your organic weapons. The universe is yours to take now, and your genetic weaponry is unparalelled.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

如果地球仍然存在，那么您创造植物在任何一次奥运会中都将是非法的。使用这些植物让您可以以惊人的速度奔跑、在陡峭的表面上跳跃，甚至改变身体的重力强度。您的研究甚至进入了一个陌生的、无形的领域，并创造了一种在生死攸关的情况下食用后将您带到安全地方的植物。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

The plants you've learned to make would be illegal in any Olympics, if Earth still existed. You can now run at breakneck speeds, jump up sheer surfaces and even alter the strength of gravity on your body,  all with the use of plants. You've also dipped into stranger, less corporeal realms, and created a type of plant which can be eaten in a life-or-death situation to pull you away to safety.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

你获得了羡煞旁人的硕士学位，你成功地让你的蜂巢高效地生产。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You have achieved a truly enviable master's degree. You have managed to make your hives produce efficiently.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

您最新创造出的植物是美丽的，在哪怕最危险的世界也能保护您。仅仅带着您的草药袋，就可以探索几乎任何可以想象的世界，包括炽热到能融化铅、寒冷到大气层都如雪花般飘落、放射性强到整个大地都闪烁能量光芒的极端环境。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Your latest plants are a thing of beauty, protecting you from even the most dangerous worlds. Equipped only with the contents of your herb pouch, you're now equipped to explore nearly any world imaginable, including those with lead-melting heat, atmospheres so cold it falls to the ground as snow and environments so radioactive that even the ground glistens with energy.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;7级^reset;

。利用量子流体的特性，您现在可以创造出生长远古精华的植物，古代精华在远古铁砧上升级武器时是十分有用的。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 7^reset;

Using the properties of Quantum Fluid, you are able to make a plant that grows Ancient Essence botanically. Essence is very useful for upgrading weapons at ancient crucibles.
